title: Magicpin to invest Rs 100 crore to onboard 1 lakh new restaurants and cloud kitchens on ONDC
description: Magicpin committed Rs 100 crore to onboard 1 lakh restaurants and cloud kitchens on ONDC, offering zero commission and free home delivery. This investment seeks to boost online food delivery adoption and benefit ONDC and customers alike.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
